
# ChangeLog

## v5.2.0
* Added: use preformatted errors if they are available, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3386

## v5.1.1
* Fixed: circular error when serializing error into json, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2354

## v5.1.0
* Added support for custom properties attached to the error to be exposed in error response and exposed formattError for apps to use, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2317

## v5.0.1
* long message must not be exposed in production as part of error object

## v5.0.0
* Node.JS services stack redesign, v5.0.0

## v4.0.0
* Upgraded to 4.x module versions

## v1.0.3
* Updated dependencies and node version support

## v1.0.2
* Updated dependencies
